update.description:
http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=haptix_sim_api&branch=haptix_sim_api

Matlab-centric overview of the Sim API for the next HAPTIX release.

currently references some code in [haptix-comm PR 76](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/haptix-comm/pull-request/76), I'll change the links to default once the PR gets merged.

The example won't work unless you are running branch `update_hxs_example` in `haptix-comm`, which is the branch for [haptix-comm PR 76](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/haptix-comm/pull-request/76).
update.title: Haptix Sim API tutorial

content.html: Some updates to readability in branch haptix_sim_api_scpeters (fdab0c0)

content.raw: What's the best way to use C enums in matlab? Should we just say in the previous paragraph what the integer values are for each enum value?
content.html: What's the best way to use C enums in matlab? Should we just say in the previous paragraph what the integer values are for each enum value?

content.raw: I filed a [haptix-comm issue](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/haptix-comm/issue/16/quaternion-example-code-in-matlab-is-wrong) about the manipulation of quaternions in our example code
content.html: I filed a haptix-comm issue about the manipulation of quaternions in our example code

content.raw: Ohh, I see. It's fine. I though it was a copy/paste typo.
content.html: Ohh, I see. It's fine. I though it was a copy/paste typo.

content.raw: did row vectors not work when you tried it? Brian specifically added this feature when I asked about it and it seemed to work in Octave.
content.html: did row vectors not work when you tried it? Brian specifically added this feature when I asked about it and it seemed to work in Octave.

content.raw: There's a comment in this code that says `% Row vectors work, too` which is probably wrong. It should say "change the color to green" or something similar.
content.html: There's a comment in this code that says % Row vectors work, too which is probably wrong. It should say "change the color to green" or something similar.

content.raw: need [this pull request](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/handsim/pull-request/118/match-current-keyboard-control-behavior/diff) for this part of the tutorial to work correctly.

update.title: Haptix Sim API tutorial

content.raw: this example returns empty contacts as a result of `hxs_contacts` call, due to `auto_disable`. Either we turn off [<allow_auto_disable>](http://www.sdformat.org/spec?ver=1.5&elem=model#model_allow_auto_disable) for the [wood cube model](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/src/6b844d5b49de72b7cba0542c069b3835cd08e028/wood_cube_5cm/model.sdf?at=default), or call [Model::SetEnabled](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/50b613a7c17c691b78590ba4f7bc674f095f15e1/gazebo/physics/Model.cc?at=default#cl-1035) and take a sim step before checking for contacts.
content.html: this example returns empty contacts as a result of hxs_contacts call, due to auto_disable. Either we turn off <allow_auto_disable> for the wood cube model, or call Model::SetEnabled and take a sim step before checking for contacts.
